total_sum.comm: the maximum amount of coins by default is  8589869056

admin_pub_key.comm: Owner's public key for initial operations

wait_to_date.comm: date from which funds can be distributed (see below)

granularity.comm: The minimum fraction (penny) followed by rounding (default is 0.0001)

passkey.comm: Paraphrase for accessing modifiable functions (see below)

corporate_account.comm: the corporation's account, to which tokens can be transferred in accordance with the ‚Äúcorporate_share‚Äú parameter

corporate_share.comm: the percentage of issued tokens that goes to the account of the corporation

mint_param.comm: {Umax, ùõΩ2, ùúè1} -a set of coefficients that determine the formula for earning a node in exchange for itsSLA indicators

nBurn.comm: Number of times the Burn command, which allows admin to destroy some numbers of tokens. By default, nBurn= 3

fee.comm: commission on transactions with DEC (default 1%)‚Äìcan be changed later

tips.comm: Tips on some transactions with DEC can be changed for each peers
